reviewText:
This is not a major label DVD release but a private manufactured DVD. The DVD is a documentary about the Jazz Passengers and their collaboration with Deborah Harry of Blondie. The live concert footage is mixed with interviews with the band and Deborah Harry. For those that want to hear just the Jazz Passengers with Deborah Harry live, there is a CD included in this DVD/CD combination.
If your DVD does not play properly, the manufacturer will quickly replace your DVD with a replacement which he has tested in several DVD players for quality.
